dataObjects.subject: http://www.eol.org/voc/table_of_contents#Taxonomy
dataObjects.description: Comments: Subgenus ARTHROPHALLUS, SENILIS species group (Rauchenberger 1989). See Rauchenberger (1989) for a study of the interrelationships of the subgenera and species groups within the genus GAMBUSIA.
